tomcarter.bombero.assets

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • tomcarter.bombero.assets.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton Safes and loads data from libGdx preferences or from remote server

    • Method Summary

      • saveLevelData

        public static void saveLevelData(int levelNumber,
                                 int score,
                                 int livesLeft,
                                 int fireSize,
                                 int bombCount)
        Persists starting data for level if it should
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - - completed level + 1 (after completing level 1 = starting data for level 2)
        score - - score after completed level
        livesLeft - - how many lives player has after completed level
        fireSize - - size of fire after completed level
        bombCount - - count of bombs after completed level

        number of completed levels so far

        Returns:

        Returns highscore if valid (fetched)
        Returns:
        if fetched = highscore, else -1
